Uses of Class
com.terremark.config.PropertiesBuilder

Packages that use PropertiesBuilder
com.terremark Provides the classes necessary for interfacing with the Terremark API. 
com.terremark.config Package contains the necessary classes and enumerations to build the client configuration. 
 

Uses of PropertiesBuilder in com.terremark
 

Methods in com.terremark with parameters of type PropertiesBuilder
static TerremarkClient TerremarkFactory.getClient(PropertiesBuilder builder)
          Returns an instance of Terremark client.
 

Uses of PropertiesBuilder in com.terremark.config
 

Methods in com.terremark.config that return PropertiesBuilder
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setAccessKey(String accessKey)
          Set the access key for performing the Cloud API authentication.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setAPIVersion(Version version)
          Set the API version to use.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setContentType(ContentType contentType)
          Set the content type to use.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setEndPoint(String uri)
          Set the API end point URL.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setHttpClient(org.apache.http.client.HttpClient httpClient)
          Apache HttpClient to use for connecting to the API end point.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setPassword(String password)
          Set the user password for performing basic authentication.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setPrivateKey(String privateKey)
          Set the private key for performing the Cloud API authentication.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setProxyHost(String proxyHost)
          Set the proxy host (name or IP address) to use, when connecting to the API end point.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setProxyPort(int proxyPort)
          Set the proxy port to use, when connecting to the API end point.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setRetryHandler(RetryHandler retryHandler)
          Retry handler to use for determining if failed GET calls should be retried.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setSignatureAlgorithm(SignatureAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm)
          Signature algorithm to use when Cloud API authentication is configured.
 PropertiesBuilder PropertiesBuilder.setUserName(String userName)
          Set the user name to use for performing basic authentication.
